purpose: Initializes system date and displays program startup information.
Reads the next authorization summary from IMS and processes it if found, setting end-of-segment flag when done.
Displays a message indicating the file is being closed.
Inserts the parent authorization summary segment into the GSAM database and abends if the insertion fails.
Retrieves the next authorization detail child segment from IMS and updates processing counters and records until no more children are found.
Abends the program with return code 16 when the IMS GN call fails for the root segment.
Inserts the retrieved child segment data into a GSAM file after successfully reading an IMS child segment.
Abends the program with return code 16 when the IMS GNP call fails for the child segment.
Abends the program with return code 16 when the GSAM insert for the parent segment fails.
Abends the program with return code 16 when the GSAM insert for the child segment fails.
